name: phllmod

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, clvec))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ PreHil, c0 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ LVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, clvec))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c0, clmod))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PreHil → c0 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PreHil → c0 ∈ LVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LVec → c0 ∈ LMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, clvec))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c0, clmod))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PreHil → c0 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PreHil → c0 ∈ LVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LVec → c0 ∈ LMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c0, clmod))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PreHil → c0 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LVec → c0 ∈ LMod)

comment: A pre-Hilbert space is a left module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
